verify.hint: The verification script checks if the nginx service is enabled to start at boot by looking for the nginx service symlink in the /etc/rc2.d directory. If the symlink is found, the verification passes. If not, the verification fails.

verify.name: Verify the nginx service is enabled to start at boot
verify.hint: The verification script checks if the nginx service is running, which indicates that it has been enabled to start at boot. If the service is running, the verification passes. If the service is not running, the verification fails.

steps.title: Manage Service Startup Priorities with update-rc.d

verify.name: Verify the startup priority of the rsyslog service
verify.hint: The verification script checks if the rsyslog service has a startup priority of 18 by looking for the "S18rsyslog" symlink in the /etc/rc2.d directory. If the symlink is found, the verification passes. If not, the verification fails.
